summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of WhatsApp Business Communication Platform completed. Backend APIs 91.3% functional, frontend core features working with minor React rendering issues.

critical_bugs.issue: AI chatbot integration failing - 'LlmChat' object has no attribute 'chat'

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Attempts to call real Meta API instead of mocked responses
flaky_endpoints.workaround: This is expected behavior for MOCKED API

ui_bugs.issue: React rendering error: 'Objects are not valid as a React child'
ui_bugs.selector: Campaign creation dialog fails to open

integration_issues.issue: Backend AI integration not working properly

issues: Console warnings about missing DialogContent descriptions

Signup flow creates account and tenant
Users - invite new user with roles
